mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, writer, publisher, pubdate, img, isbn, org_price, sale_price, grade, content, phone, contraction, place) values(#{title},#{writer},#{publisher},#{pubdate},#{img},#{isbn},#{org_price},#{sale_price},#{grade},#{content},#{phone},#{contraction},#{place})
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, publisher, pubdate, img, isbn, org_price, sale_price, grade, content, phone, contraction, place, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, publisher=#{publisher}, pubdate=#{pubdate}, img=#{img}, isbn=#{isbn}, org_price=#{org_price}, sale_price=#{sale_price}, grade=#{grade}, content=#{content}, phone=#{phone}, contraction=#{contraction}, place=#{place} where bno =#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, publisher, pubdate, img, isbn, org_price, sale_price, grade, content, phone, contraction, place, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc

select bno, title, writer, publisher, pubdate, img, isbn, org_price, sale_price, grade, content, phone, contraction, place, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{page}, 10

select bno, title, writer, publisher, pubdate, img, isbn, org_price, sale_price, grade, content, phone, contraction, place, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno > 0
